header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced fullstack software engineer with 6+ years developing scalable, distributed systems and component libraries. Proven track record building high-impact products serving millions of users, with expertise in modern frameworks, microservices architecture, and cloud platforms. Strong background in schema registries, API development, and cross-team collaboration in fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Software engineer on streaming data platform team enabling cross-team data sharing through schema registry and real-time data streaming infrastructure supporting millions of users worldwide.
Architected and developed foundational component libraries and frameworks for real-time data streaming, enabling teams to publish/subscribe to event streams with high reliability and performance.

Built a stream snapshot system allowing teams to maintain stateful applications from event streams, including integration with a unified content metadata system for cataloging media content across multiple platforms.

Designed and implemented an enterprise schema registry using version-controlled repositories with OpenAPI and AWS Smithy schemas, including complex validation pipelines ensuring backward compatibility across distributed applications.

Developed a multi-language artifact publishing system supporting Scala, Java, Python, and Protobuf with JSON serialization libraries, functional programming integration, and automated testing frameworks.
Collaborated on enterprise data lake solutions using modern columnar formats and cloud storage, creating distributed processing jobs for analytics dashboards and performance monitoring.

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Core developer on proof-of-stake blockchain platform enabling supply chain verification and ethical business tracking through distributed ledger technology.
Built distributed blockchain runtime using Akka actors with TCP networking and HTTP API for node management including transaction and staking key operations.
Developed a transaction streaming client using Scala http4s, Cats Effect, MongoDB indexing, and Protobuf API, with React proof-of-concept UI demonstrating real-time transaction integration.

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Full-stack engineer on a web application for construction project management, serving project managers, architects, and project leads with document tracking and workflow management.

Developed a sophisticated change management system featuring event-sourced architecture, storing user interactions as immutable events with derived application state, integrating with enterprise resource management system.
Delivered end-to-end features across technology stack including database models, C# .NET microservices APIs deployed on cloud infrastructure, and responsive web UI components.
Worked with diverse data storage solutions including relational databases and specialized event stores for event sourcing implementation.

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Developed comprehensive test automation framework enabling non-technical QA team members to write API and UI tests using simplified C# interfaces.
Built API testing framework for microservices validation and complex Selenium-based UI testing framework with XPath selectors supporting both headless and browser-based execution.
Executed performance testing including bulk operations and load testing to ensure application responsiveness under high usage scenarios.
